summary: Deep analysis confirms temporal and modal sorries have fundamentally different root causes. Multi-family construction (Strategy C) can ONLY resolve the modal_backward sorry, NOT the temporal sorries. Temporal sorries are blocked by the omega-rule limitation (infinitary reasoning) and cannot be resolved by any multi-family approach. Simplest viable path: accept all 3 sorries as construction axioms (completeness uses only forward truth lemma anyway). Alternative: implement multi-family for modal only.

artifacts.summary: Follow-up analysis showing temporal/modal sorries have different root causes; multi-family resolves only modal sorry; recommends accepting temporal sorries as axioms
